downloadTitle: How to Send and Receive Faults in Workflow Services
downloadDescription: This article describes how to set up and use custom faults in a .NET 4 workflow service.

detailsSection: This article describes in detail how to configure a fault contract in the Visual Studio 2010 workflow designer for an invalid request scenario. In addition, setting up a declared fault using the Receive and SendReply activities is demonstrated.
